tool_description: Find complete playlists and soundtracks from movies and tv shows. Playlists include audio samples, Spotify, youtube, apply music links, scene description and more.
name: Soundtrack Playlists
title: Soundtrack Playlists

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://soundtrack-playlists.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "soundtrack-playlists.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://soundtrack-playlists.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "soundtrack-playlists.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
